page.title: 12RUDDINGTON WAKES
page.content: THE {ST.PETER'S FEAST }was held for hundreds of years near to June 29th. and when schooling started in {Ruddington}they used to get a weeks holiday. The feast was held on {The {Green}and they would have competiotns like climbing a greasy pole,guessing the weight of a pig and a tug of war between the Framework Knitters and farmworkers. Since 1968 it has been held on the {Recreation Ground}on{Wilford Road}and it is only a visiting fair run by Cox's. I asked the children at school what they liked best at the{Wakes.} 7&8 { FOOD RIDES MONEY years { Hotdogs Waltzer Â£2 9&10 years {Candyfloss Cyclone Â£3
